q: Rep. Mike Pence ( R-IN), framed it as an effort to deny government funding for abortions. "The time has come to deny all federal funding to Planned Parenthood of America," Mike Pence said. I've authored the Title X Abortion Provider Prohibition Act, which would deny Title X funds to Planned Parenthood or any other abortion provider and Congress must act and act now to move this important legislation.
